column1: Uchi////Many many thanks to providing great tasting food and friendly joyful service on my birthday today! I really appreciate Uchi for making this evening an outstanding experience for us. We enjoyed all of the food here and will be back for more as it has definitely lifted my tastebuds with all these great combinations that I really appreciate. All the descriptions really synchronized with the actual taste! Excellent job! Will definitely love to visit again :)
